recommendations.name: Custom Branded T-Shirts
recommendations.reasoning: Custom branded T-shirts are perfect for increasing brand visibility and for team building. They are cost-effective and can be used for company events.
customization_suggestions: Black or Navy with a white or silver company logo for high visibility

recommendations.name: Digital Device Accessories
recommendations.reasoning: Digital device accessories are practical and relevant to the tech industry. They offer device protection and brand visibility, and can be used as employee equipment or client gifts.
customization_suggestions: Black or Gray to match tech devices, with the company logo in a contrasting color

recommendations.name: Premium Executive Notebook
recommendations.reasoning: Given the company's previous purchases and their industry, a premium executive notebook would be a great fit. It can be used for professional meetings and presentations, and it's a great way to enhance the company's professional image.
customization_suggestions: Black or Navy to match the tech industry style

recommendations.name: Coffee Mug Set
recommendations.reasoning: Coffee mug sets are practical and offer high visibility. They can be used in the office or given as employee gifts, and they're a cost-effective way to increase brand awareness.
customization_suggestions: Black or Blue with a white or silver company logo for high visibility

recommendations.name: Health & Wellness Kit
recommendations.reasoning: A health & wellness kit can be a great solution for employee retention. It promotes health and employee engagement, and can be used for employee wellness programs.
customization_suggestions: Black or Blue to match the company colors, with health materials tailored to the tech industry

recommendations.name: Training & Education Materials
recommendations.reasoning: Training & education materials can be used for employee training and professional development. They offer educational value and brand reinforcement.
customization_suggestions: Blue or Green to match the company colors, with materials focused on software development and AI trends

top_recommendation.name: Custom Branded T-Shirts
top_recommendation.reasoning: Custom branded T-shirts are perfect for increasing brand visibility and for team building. They are cost-effective and can be used for company events.
customization_suggestions: Black or Navy with a white or silver company logo for high visibility
